title: High Performance CommonMark and Github Markdown Rendering in R
text: High Performance CommonMark Github Markdown Rendering R  CommonMark specification defines rationalized version markdown syntax. package uses ‘cmark’ reference implementation converting markdown text various formats including html, latex groff man. addition exposes markdown parse tree xml format. latest version package also adds support Github extensions including tables, autolinks strikethrough text.

title: High Performance CommonMark and Github Markdown Rendering in R
code:
library(commonmark) md <- "## Test An *example* text for the `commonmark` package." # Convert to Latex cat(markdown_latex(md)) \subsection{Test} An \emph{example} text for the \texttt{commonmark} package. # Convert to HTML cat(markdown_html(md))

Test

An example text for the commonmark package.

# Convert to 'groff' man cat(markdown_man(md)) .SS Test .PP An \f[I]example\f[] text for the \f[C]commonmark\f[] package. # Convert back to (normalized) markdown cat(markdown_commonmark(md)) ## Test An *example* text for the `commonmark` package. # The markdown parse tree cat(markdown_xml(md)) Test An example text for the commonmark package.

title: High Performance CommonMark and Github Markdown Rendering in R
text: Commonmark includes several ‘extensions’ enable features (yet) part official specification. current version commonmark R package offers 4 extensions: table support rendering tables strikethough via ~sometext~ syntax autolink automatically turn URLs hyperlinks tagfilter blacklist html tags: title textarea style xmp iframe noembed noframes script plaintext. tasklist turns certain list items checkboxes extensions added Github support GitHub Flavored Markdown.
code:
table <- ' aaa | bbb | ccc | ddd | eee :-- | --- | :-: | --- | --: fff | ggg | hhh | iii | jjj' cat(markdown_latex(table, extensions = TRUE)) \begin{table} \begin{tabular}{llclr} aaa & bbb & ccc & ddd & eee \\ fff & ggg & hhh & iii & jjj \\ \end{tabular} \end{table} cat(markdown_html(table, extensions = TRUE))
aaa bbb ccc ddd eee
fff ggg hhh iii jjj

what: Parse and render markdown text — commonmark
title: Parse and render markdown text — commonmark
text: Converts markdown text several formats using John MacFarlane's cmark reference implementation. Supported output formats include html, latex, groff man, normalized "commonmark" markdown. addition markdown parse tree can returned xml format.

title: Parse and render markdown text — commonmark
code: markdown_html(   text,   hardbreaks = FALSE,   smart = FALSE,   normalize = FALSE,   sourcepos = FALSE,   footnotes = FALSE,   extensions = FALSE )  markdown_xml(   text,   hardbreaks = FALSE,   smart = FALSE,   normalize = FALSE,   sourcepos = FALSE,   footnotes = FALSE,   extensions = FALSE )  markdown_man(   text,   hardbreaks = FALSE,   smart = FALSE,   normalize = FALSE,   footnotes = FALSE,   width = 0,   extensions = FALSE )  markdown_commonmark(   text,   hardbreaks = FALSE,   smart = FALSE,   normalize = FALSE,   footnotes = FALSE,   width = 0,   extensions = FALSE )  markdown_text(   text,   hardbreaks = FALSE,   smart = FALSE,   normalize = FALSE,   footnotes = FALSE,   width = 0,   extensions = FALSE )  markdown_latex(   text,   hardbreaks = FALSE,   smart = FALSE,   normalize = FALSE,   footnotes = FALSE,   width = 0,   extensions = FALSE )

title: Parse and render markdown text — commonmark
text: text Markdown text hardbreaks Treat newlines hard line breaks. option specified, hard wrapping disabled regardless value given width. smart Use smart punctuation. See details. normalize Consolidate adjacent text nodes. sourcepos Include source position attribute output. footnotes parse footnotes extensions Enables Github extensions. Can TRUE () FALSE (none) character vector subset available extensions. width Specify wrap width (default 0 = nowrap).

title: Parse and render markdown text — commonmark
text: Support extensions (including tables autolink) provided via Github fork cmark. now opt-enabled extensions parameter. See also manual page extensions. smart punctuation enabled, straight double single quotes rendered curly quotes, depending position. Moreover -- rendered -- (en-dash), --- rendered --- (em-dash), ... rendered ... (ellipses).

title: Parse and render markdown text — commonmark
code: md <- readLines("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yihui/knitr/master/NEWS.md") html <- markdown_html(md) xml <- markdown_xml(md) man <- markdown_man(md) tex <- markdown_latex(md) cm <- markdown_commonmark(md) text <- markdown_text(md)

title: Github CommonMark Extensions — extensions
text: Github fork cmark supports several markdown extensions provide features (yet) official commonmark spec.

title: Github CommonMark Extensions — extensions
text: Currently following extensions supported: table support rendering tables: gfm-spec section 4.10 strikethrough via ~sometext~ syntax: gfm-spec section 6.5 autolink automatically turn URLs hyperlinks: gfm-spec section 6.9 tagfilter blacklist html tags: title textarea style xmp iframe noembed noframes script plaintext: gfm-spec section 6.11 tasklist turns certain list items checkboxes: gfm-spec section 5.3 See full spec GitHub Flavored Markdown.
